quest.name: Carrotlight, Carrot Bright
journal:
What's a musicking station without handheld carrotlights? A sad musicking station. And Managingway won't stand for it.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested items to Managingway.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: According to recent surveys, the availability of handheld carrotlights has dramatically increased overall musicking satisfaction.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: But a review of data from the past three cycles reveals that we must increase production of said lights by six percent if we are to meet current demand.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: I have asked Keepingway to procure additional supplies and begin assembly immediately, so could you offer them your assistance?

dialogue.name: KEEPINGWAY
dialogue.text: By my whiskers am I glad to see you! When Managingway told me how many lights we needed to make, I thought I might cry.

dialogue.name: KEEPINGWAY
dialogue.text: We're currently short on decorative parts, so could you handle those? The doing supporter is stocked with extra materials if you need them.

dialogue.name: KEEPINGWAY
dialogue.text: We're currently short on handles, so could you craft some of those? The doing supporter is stocked with extra materials if you need them.

dialogue.name: KEEPINGWAY
dialogue.text: We're currently short on glowy bits...um, the things that make the carrotlights light up? Y-You probably know better than I do! The doing supporter is stocked with extra materials if you need them.

dialogue.name: KEEPINGWAY
dialogue.text: When you've finished, go and tell Managingway. I'll have the others start assembling from the pieces we have!

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER04693
dialogue.text: Thank you for your supply request. <blip> Please use what you have before asking for more─always clean your plate!

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER04693
dialogue.text: Thank you for your supply request. <blip> Please use what you have before asking for more─always clean your plate!

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER04693
dialogue.text: Thank you for your supply request. <blip> Please use what you have before asking for more─always clean your plate!

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER04693
dialogue.text: Thank you for your supply request. <blip> Congratulations! You have been recognized as “needy.” Procuring additional materials now.

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER04693
dialogue.text: Thank you for your supply request. <blip> Congratulations! You have been recognized as “needy.” Procuring additional materials now.

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER04693
dialogue.text: Thank you for your supply request. <blip> Congratulations! You have been recognized as “needy.” Procuring additional materials now.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: How goes carrotlight production? Have we reached our six percent?

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Oh, thank goodness! With this, our Ways should be sufficiently supplied with carrotlights for the time being.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: We have also received requests for a wider variety of colors, as well as improvements to the carrotlights' basic functionality. Exciting times await!

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: I hope I can count on your future assistance, but for now, please accept this small token of our appreciation.
